main_title: How One Man Stole the Eiffel Tower Twice
hook: [excited] You won't believe this - in 1925, a con artist named Victor Lustig convinced scrap dealers he could sell the Eiffel Tower! He forged documents and made off with tons of metal before authorities caught on.
description: A conman tricked scrap dealers into buying the Eiffel Tower! This audacious scheme is more unbelievable than you think! #EiffelTower #History #Scam
